snippet: Accounts of Bo Guagua’s reportedly lavish arrival at Jon M. Huntsman Jr.’s home in China last spring have been disputed by several people involved.
abstract: Accounts of Bo Guagua’s reportedly lavish arrival at Jon M Huntsman Jr’s home in China in 2011 have been disputed by several people involved; story has become political weapon wielded against Bo's father Bo Xilai, who was purged from his party posts and put under investigation in April.

byline.original: By DAVID BARBOZA and EDWARD WONG

lead_paragraph: Accounts of Bo Guagua’s reportedly lavish arrival at Jon M. Huntsman Jr.’s home in China last spring have been disputed by several people involved.

headline.seo: Details Are Refuted in Tale of Bo Guagua’s Red Ferrari
headline.main: Details Are Refuted in Tale of Bo Guagua’s Red Ferrari
headline.print_headline: Details Contradicted in Episode of Chinese Privilege
